summary: Flowers, Feathers, and Fists - Bloodyshadow1 - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Flowers, Feathers, and Fists - Bloodyshadow1 - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/?
Fandom: Critical Role (Web Series)
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Beauregard/Yasha/Zuala (Critical Role), Beauregard/Yasha (Critical Role), Yasha/Zuala (Critical Role)
Characters: Beauregard (Critical Role), Yasha (Critical Role), Zuala (Critical Role)
Additional Tags: Polyamory, Femslash, Accidental Cheating, poly negotiations, Not Really Cheating, more a mistake
Summary:

Beau was trying not to be selfish, she really was. She just wanted Yasha to be happy, even if she wasn’t with her. So she concocts this boneheaded scheme to bring back her crushes wife, against all odds, it worked. Even if everyday her heart broke a bit more, Beau knew it was worth it, as long as Yasha was happy. As long as Yasha could be happy with someone Beau could handle all the heartbreak in the world. She just wasn’t prepared for a woman like Zuala and it brings a whole mess of other confusing things into the mix. Despite what she wants will she ruin everything anyway

summary: No Grave Can Hold My Body Down - Midnight_Ophelia - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: No Grave Can Hold My Body Down - Midnight_Ophelia - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 9/30
Fandom: Critical Role (Web Series)
Rating: Mature
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Mollymauk Tealeaf/Caleb Widogast
Characters: Mollymauk Tealeaf, Caleb Widogast, Astrid (Critical Role), Eodwulf (Critical Role), Trent Ikithon, Original Characters, Nott (Critical Role), Yasha (Critical Role), Beauregard (Critical Role), Fjord (Critical Role), Jester Lavorre, Caduceus Clay
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Genderfluid Mollymauk Tealeaf, Slow Burn, Warmage Caleb Widogast, Politics, War, Worldbuilding, Caleb Widogast Deserves Nice Things, Mollymauk Tealeaf’s Backstory, Character Death Fix, Time Travel Fix-It, Marriage of Convenience, Trent Ikithon Being an Asshole, Hurt/Comfort, Angsty in places but there’s gonna be a happy ending, Political Marriage, Mentions of past child abuse, Eventual Sex, Recreational Drug Use, Background Relationships, Past Astrid/Caleb/Eodwulf, Royal Mollymauk, All of the Mighty Nein show up eventually, Watch as Caleb juggles multiple secrets, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Rating May Change
Summary:

First he’s dead and then he’s not.

Mollymauk Tealeaf crawls out of his grave two years in the past with an order from the Matron of Ravens’ Champion: Find Caleb Widogast and fix what has happened. And what will. That’s easier said then done when he’s got his past (and Caleb’s closet full of skeletons) to contend with.

Why can’t anything ever be simple?

Chapter Summary: Tensions grow and tempers flare on the evening before the long road to Xhorhas.

(Reposting link since it disappeared from the tags for some reason)

blog.name: yfere
blog.title: just muddling through
blog.description: Alcin, 22. they/them. Critical Role and assorted nonsense

summary: for the slow burn/fake date/enemies to lovers: caleb, the gentleman and the ruby of the sea
question: for the slow burn/fake date/enemies to lovers: caleb, the gentleman and the ruby of the sea
answer:
Slow burn Caleb, and only partly because it’s punny. And only partly because he seems like the nervous sort who’d need to be eased into things to be secure and happy in a romance. The rest of it is just me being a huge sap and loving the man to bits, I would be incapable of hiding it behind a fake dating act, or mustering any joking animosity.

But there is an adrenaline junkie in me who absolutely wants to enemies to lovers the gentleman. The stakes are high–getting killed or sold into slavery if I’m not clever enough to ward him off? Sign me up! There’s a part of me too that just wants to take over a criminal underworld–I’d want to punch in on his territory and be all smug about it because I am in fact a little bit evil.

Adrenaline junkie also says fake dating Marion would be brilliant–I would instantly become marked for death by at least 50 different patrons of hers! Amazing! Dodging assassination attempts while trying to weasel my way into her actual (and not just performative) affections? Gooooooood.

But there is an adrenaline junkie in me who absolutely wants to enemies to lovers the gentleman. The stakes are high–getting killed or sold into slavery if I’m not clever enough to ward him off? Sign me up! There’s a part of me too that just wants to take over a criminal underworld–I’d want to punch in on his territory and be all smug about it because I am in fact a little bit evil.

Sign me up! There’s a part of me too that just wants to take over a criminal underworld–I’d want to punch in on his territory and be all smug about it because I am in fact a little bit evil.

Adrenaline junkie also says fake dating Marion would be brilliant–I would instantly become marked for death by at least 50 different patrons of hers! Amazing! Dodging assassination attempts while trying to weasel my way into her actual (and not just performative) affections? Gooooooood.

The rest of it is just me being a huge sap and loving the man to bits, I would be incapable of hiding it behind a fake dating act, or mustering any joking animosity.

But there is an adrenaline junkie in me who absolutely wants to enemies to lovers the gentleman. The stakes are high–getting killed or sold into slavery if I’m not clever enough to ward him off? Sign me up! There’s a part of me too that just wants to take over a criminal underworld–I’d want to punch in on his territory and be all smug about it because I am in fact a little bit evil.

Adrenaline junkie also says fake dating Marion would be brilliant–I would instantly become marked for death by at least 50 different patrons of hers! Amazing! Dodging assassination attempts while trying to weasel my way into her actual (and not just performative) affections? Gooooooood.
